title: wtf is this shit
body: Wtf is worng with this fking matchmaking everytime I win few games next 10 i get fking mental people, and even i take brakes not to tilt and still next fking day  retards keep coimng, and now when i start climbing again i get most retarded people ever  and  now  lose more fking lp than gain even though i paly fking 1v9 games  and if twam doesent lose beofre 20 mins  they  keep geting fking cuaght  asnd waste 50 fking mis and niow i need to play fking more to get  back even though i play  10 times better than retards i play now  .

replies.body: This post is ironic, you seem like the sort of person everyone regrets being matched with.
And trash is downvoting post i see
